attributes.action: Make Frank Field the next speaker of the house
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I cannot believe there is a better person for this massive job
He is liked around the house for being an honest person, as well as around the country as well.
Making Frank Field speaker of the house would repair so much of the damage cause in resent months

rejection.details: Your petition is no longer relevant
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
